app.models.inventory module

class app.models.inventory.Inventory(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: Model

This is a Django Model of the Inventory Table

It contains:

  • name: Name of inventory item

  • price: Price in dollars of the inventory item

  • stock: Current Stock of the Item

  • reorder_level: Level needed to reorder inventory item

Parameters:

  • id (BigAutoField) – Primary key: ID

  • name (TextField) – Name

  • price (FloatField) – Price

  • stock (IntegerField) – Stock

  • reorder_level (IntegerField) – Reorder level

Reverse relationships:

Parameters:

menuinventory (Reverse ForeignKey from MenuInventory) – All menu inventorys of this inventory (related name of inventory)

exception DoesNotExist

Bases: ObjectDoesNotExist

Bases: MultipleObjectsReturned

app.models.menu module

class app.models.menu.Menu(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: Model

This is a Django Model of the Menu Table

It contains:

  • name: Name of menu item

  • price: Price of menu item

  • category: Choices representing food item categories (BURGERS, BASKETS, SANDWICHES, SHAKESNSWEETS, BEVERAGES, SIDES or SAUCE

  • description: More details about the menu item

  • season_start: Start of when the menu item is in season

  • season_end: End of when the menu item is in season

  • display: Wether to display the menu item or not

  • image: Reference to the image of the menu item

Parameters:

  • id (BigAutoField) – Primary key: ID

  • name (CharField) – Name

  • price (FloatField) – Price

  • category (IntegerField) – Category

  • description (TextField) – Description

  • season_start (DateTimeField) – Season start

  • season_end (DateTimeField) – Season end

  • display (BooleanField) – Display

  • image (TextField) – Image

Reverse relationships:

Parameters:

  • menuinventory (Reverse ForeignKey from MenuInventory) – All menu inventorys of this menu (related name of menu)

  • ordermenu (Reverse ForeignKey from OrderMenu) – All order menus of this menu (related name of menu)

class CategoryOptions(value)

Bases: IntegerChoices

Contains enumerated choices for categories

BASKETS = 1
BEVERAGES = 4
BURGERS = 0
SANDWICHES = 2
SAUCE = 6
SHAKESNSWEETS = 3
SIDES = 5

app.models.order module

class app.models.order.Order(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: Model

This is a Django Model of the Order Table

It contains:

  • employee: Foregin Key of User table

  • total: Total price of the order

  • timestamp: Date and Time of the order

  • status: Current status of the order (In Progress, Completed, Incomplete, Deleted)

Parameters:

  • id (BigAutoField) – Primary key: ID

  • total (FloatField) – Total

  • timestamp (DateTimeField) – Timestamp

  • status (IntegerField) – Status

Relationship fields:

Parameters:

employee (ForeignKey to User) – Employee (related name: order)

Reverse relationships:

Parameters:

ordermenu (Reverse ForeignKey from OrderMenu) – All order menus of this order (related name of order)

exception DoesNotExist

Bases: ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned

Bases: MultipleObjectsReturned

Bases: IntegerChoices

  • menu: Foregin key for menu table

app.models.user module

class app.models.user.User(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: Model

This is a Django Model of the User Table

It contains:

  • user: Name of the user

  • email: Email of the user

  • user_type: Specify if the user is a CUSTOMER, KITCHEN, CASHIER, MANAGER, or ADMIN

  • shift_start: Date Time of Shift Start of User

  • shift_end: Date Time

Parameters:

  • id (BigAutoField) – Primary key: ID

  • name (CharField) – Name

  • email (TextField) – Email

  • user_type (IntegerField) – User type

  • shift_start (DateTimeField) – Shift start

  • shift_end (DateTimeField) – Shift end

Reverse relationships:

Parameters:

order (Reverse ForeignKey from Order) – All orders of this user (related name of employee)

exception DoesNotExist

Bases: ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned

Bases: MultipleObjectsReturned
